com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface HttpExchange

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Transport, UriAccessor, Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpExchangeSupport

    public interface HttpExchange
extends Transport
    Represents an HTTP request-response exchange.

    A response is regarded to be chunked automatically. A multipart/form-data POST request is not supported, but you can handle those requests by calling Wrapper.unwrap(Class) and using provider specific API.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  HttpExchange.Method
      HTTP request methods.
      static class  HttpExchange.Status
      HTTP status codes.

      • method

        HttpExchange.Method method()
        The HTTP request method.

      • headers

        Map<String,List<String>> headers()
        A map of all request headers. The returned map is case insensitive.

        The action to read the request body.

      • status

        void status(HttpExchange.Status status)
        Sets the status code for the response. The default value is OK(200).
